company.name: The RAM PLC
company.description: A leading healthcare solutions provider specializing in medical equipment, pharmaceuticals, and healthcare services.

coreServices.name: Medical Equipment Supply
coreServices.description: Provision of high-quality medical equipment and devices to healthcare facilities.

coreServices.name: Pharmaceutical Distribution
coreServices.description: Distribution of genuine pharmaceuticals and medical supplies to hospitals and pharmacies.

coreServices.name: Healthcare Consulting
coreServices.description: Expert consulting services for healthcare facility setup and management.

coreServices.name: Equipment Maintenance
coreServices.description: Comprehensive maintenance and calibration services for medical equipment.

faqs.question: What regions do you operate in?
faqs.answer: We primarily operate in Ethiopia with plans to expand to other East African countries.

faqs.question: Do you provide installation and training?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive installation, commissioning, and training for all equipment we supply.

faqs.question: What is your lead time for equipment delivery?
faqs.answer: Delivery times vary based on the equipment and location, typically ranging from 2-8 weeks after order confirmation.

faqs.question: Do you offer equipment financing options?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with financial institutions to provide flexible financing solutions for our clients.

faqs.question: How do you ensure product quality?
faqs.answer: We source our products from reputable manufacturers and ensure all products meet international quality standards and certifications.
